source.cd4946b3:
# Numerical variable to categorical - Assest_name
asset_details = (pd.Series(asset_details["Asset_Name"].values, index=asset_details["Asset_ID"])).to_dict()
time_series["Asset_ID"] = time_series["Asset_ID"].map(asset_details)
time_series.head(10)
source.b1de0fa8:
# Measures of Central Tendency
print("******** Mean *********")
print(time_series.groupby("Asset_ID").mean(),"\n")
print("********* Standar Deviation ***********\n")
print(time_series.groupby("Asset_ID").std(),"\n")
print("********* Variance ***********\n")
print(time_series.groupby("Asset_ID").var())
